      • createTask

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#group, \'member\') or hasPermission(#group, \'MANAGER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')")
Long createTask(Task task,
                                                                                                                                              Group group)
                                                                                                                                       throws AppException

      • getTasks

        List<Task> getTasks(String orderByInsertionDate,
                    Integer numberDaysToLookBack,
                    boolean completedOnly)
             throws AppException
        Parameters:
        orderByInsertionDate - - if set, it represents the order by criteria (ASC or DESC) for displaying tasks
        numberDaysToLookBack - - if set, it represents number of days to look back for tasks, null
        group - - the group of by which to search for tasks
        Returns:
        list with tasks corresponding to search criteria
        Throws:
        AppException
